definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: He says this will help the industry, but not enough.
sentences.chinese: 他说，油价下降对航空业有好处，但这并不够。

sentences.english: A foray into the LCC segment is now not likely for Cathay Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 对国泰航空而言，目前进入低成本航空业是不可能的。

sentences.english: Chinese aviation transportaion is not only small-scale, but also has excessive competition seriously phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 我国航空业目前不仅规模小，而且过度竞争现象严重。

sentences.english: Now all four companies have merged into aerospace titan Boeing.
sentences.chinese: 如今这四家都被航空业巨擘波音合并掉了。

sentences.english: Japan Airlines Bankruptcy shake the global aviation industry will be in Japan tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 日航破产震动全球航空业将是日本的明天？

sentences.english: The airline industry, however, continues to struggle.
sentences.chinese: 然而航空业仍在继续挣扎着。

sentences.english: But airlines must still prepare for a carbon-constrained world.
sentences.chinese: 罗锐认为，航空业正式进入限碳世界。

sentences.english: China's air-travel industry has, indeed, lived up to the hype.
sentences.chinese: 中国的航空业确实不负盛名。

sentences.english: But I still want to work in the aviation industry.
sentences.chinese: 但我还是喜欢在航空业工作。

sentences.english: Rail resource management is a form of non-technical skills training that originated in the aviation industry.
sentences.chinese: 铁资源管理是一种非技术技能培训，在航空业的起源。

sentences.english: The drop in travel is bad news for the airline industry.
sentences.chinese: 旅游热降温对航空业来说是个坏消息。

sentences.english: It is the biggest crisis in aviation and the crisis will be increasing.
sentences.chinese: 这是航空业最大的危机，而且危机将进一步升级。

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: Airbus (abbr. for 空中客車|空中客车[Kong1 zhong1 Ke4 che1])

definition: the catering industry/the hotel and restaurant business
airline (abbr. for 航空公司[hang2 kong1 gong1 si1])
